mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.sale_d, t.customer_code, c.name as customerName, t.material_code, m.NAME AS materialName, m.model, d2.dict_value modelName, m.unit, d3.dict_value unitName, t.unit_price, t.sale_date, t.sale_count, t.toll_amount, t.create_by, u.user_name AS createByName, t.create_time, t.update_by, u1.user_name AS updateByName, t.update_time, t.remark FROM sales_coustomer_pay t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_login = t.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.user_login = t.update_by LEFT JOIN material_info m ON m.CODE = t.material_code LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d2 ON d2.dict_code = m.model and d2.dict_type = 'material_model' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d3 ON d3.dict_code = m.unit and d3.dict_type = 'material_unit' left join customer_supply c on c.code = t.customer_code where t.id = #{id}
